title: Middle School Statistics Project: Understanding Through Historical Context

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and data classification skills
context.additional_context: Professionals in healthcare, legal, or technical fields requiring statistical thinking in their work, operating within smartphone-centric digital environments.

learning_goals: Explain statistical measures (midrange, median, mode, mean) by analyzing historical cases.
Perform visual statistical estimation activities using smartphone-friendly tools with real-world data.
Produce and present project-based statistical estimation processes for peer evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
